title: The American Civil War
description: The amount of information on the Civil War is incredible and sometimes confusing. so this book attempts to combine different aspects into a single source and make them understandable. This book will prove a valuable asset to anyone interested in this fascinating topic, especially students researching it. In this volume, we cover famous military leaders from both sides, battlefields, women, children, horses, music, mascots, weapons, flags, and much more. From the first shot at Fort Sumter, to the surrender at Appomattox Courthouse, the battle has begun...
author: Richard S. Hartmetz
